name: More Memory
description:
** Game created in Ludum Dare 40 **

It is a 3D match-3 game developed in Unity. I used standard assets and UniRx. Art is created by me, music is generated with GarageBand.

Features: 
*The more items you have in your inventory, you will move slower. 
*You need to destroy placed cubes and add them into your inventory, then you can use them to match 3 of same type, and they will be destroyed from the world.
*When you get at the end of the world: basic procedural generation.
*You have limited time (60 seconds) to get some items, place them and get some points.

P.S. If you move more and more in the world it will generate more cubes and the game will be slower -> The more game objects you have, the worse it is :( I just wanted to implement some procedural generation to practice, I even don't need that feature since the user just has 60 seconds to move around.
